Question: KYOCERA SLD Laser CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
KYOCERA SLD Laser CES 2024

- Unveils Laser-based Automotive Headlight Modules and FiberLight Grille Assemblies
- Automotive headlight assembly offers high-brightness white and infrared (IR) dual illumination for night vision and sensing
- Provides full features of low beam and high beam enabled by compact size modules
- IR illumination improves safety with increased detection of objects in foggy or dark conditions
- Ultra-compact LaserLight Modules have a slim profile with less than a 12.7mm lens height
- FiberLight Grille assembly offers ultra-bright white light in a thin emissive fiber
- Delivers 10 times the brightness of LED solutions
- Demonstrates a LaserLight line generator for road projection
- Working on gallium nitride-based laser light sources and modules for LiFi, sensing, and 3D printing
Summary_cn:
京瓷SLD激光2024消费电子展（CES 2024）

- 推出基于激光的汽车头灯模块和FiberLight格栅组件
- 汽车头灯组件提供高亮度的白光和红外（IR）双重照明，用于夜视和传感
- 通过紧凑型模块实现低光和高光的全功能
- IR照明提高了在雾天或黑暗环境中对物体的检测能力，提高安全性
- 超紧凑的LaserLight模块具有不到12.7毫米的镜头高度
- FiberLight格栅组件以薄的发光纤维提供超亮的白光
- 提供比LED解决方案高10倍的亮度
- 展示用于道路投影的LaserLight线条发生器
- 研发基于氮化镓的激光光源和模块，用于LiFi、传感和3D打印
